summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Digital Sahayak new features: Custom SEO slugs, Content Draft system, Admin scraping functionality, and AI recommendations. Most features working correctly with minor authentication issues on protected routes.

integration_issues.issue: Content Drafts page (/admin/content-drafts) redirects to login even after successful admin login

passed_tests: Jobs page loads with existing jobs (10 jobs found)
Admin page shows Scrape Jobs and Content Drafts buttons
POST /api/admin/scrape-jobs triggers scraping to draft queue
GET /api/admin/content-drafts returns pending drafts (0 drafts currently)
Job creation with custom slug works
AI सुझाव (Recommendations) page works perfectly with match scores
Custom slug job detail pages load correctly
AI job matching with scores and reasons
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication persistence issue for admin protected routes. The /admin/content-drafts route redirects to login even after successful admin authentication. This appears to be a session/token persistence issue in the frontend routing.
